QuestData.Title: Through Fire and Flames
QuestData.Description: Help me, $c! Piggy men come burn stables - fire! Fire!$B$B<Dorak wails incoherently before you can settle him down.>$B$BWolves still chained inside. Someone's got to save the wee wolves!
QuestData.LogDescription: Break the chains to free the wolves from the burning stables.
QuestData.RewardText: You save the wolves! So brave! Someday, maybe you get a wolf just like that to ride.$B$B<Dorak looks at the burning stables, then at the nearby river.>$B$BWhat should I do now?
